column5: I'm seeing these APS branded outboards popping up here and there - some claiming that they are a china made Yamaha clone & parts will work on either one. Does anyone have one of these or heard good/bad on them? Just curious

There was a thread awhile back about them. They are also known as Parsun Outboards. Just looking at their site and they have an odd disclaimer...see if you can spot it on their site.. https://www.parsunengines.com/25HP_4_STROKE_OUTBOARDS.html
Atleast their honest, LOL. Judging by that phrase I highly doubt they are a Yammy clone.
Interesting marketing technique. Perhaps a form of reverse psychology?  JF
I believe that a Chinese Parsun employee in the translation department might be moving to Tibet soon.
Or perhaps a disgruntled employee leaving their mark before they departed the company portals for the last time.  JF
